pages.title: Stratified Upgrade Template
pages.text: This is used to upgrade a diamond pickaxe to the "Stratified" level.$(br2) This is made from Spouting "Liquid Red Dragon Essence" onto a "Netherite Upgrade Template".
This pickaxe is required to mine the "Laminated Crystal Ore".
Can only be mined with a "Stratified Pickaxe" or higher.
Made from compacting "Laminated Crystal Dust", "Clay Balls", and "Lava".

pages.title: Stratified Essence
pages.text: Obtained from killing the "OG Stratospherical Shard of the Dragon".

pages.title: Liquid Red Essence
pages.text: Obtained from draining a "Stratified Dragon Essence" item.
Obtained from a Sequenced Assembly starting with "Charged Laminated Crystal Brick", and adding to it "Laminated Crystal", and "Liquid Red Dragon Essence".

pages.title: Nether Portal
pages.text: Used in making the Stratospherical Nether Portal

pages.title: End Portal
pages.text: Used in making the Stratospherical End Portal

pages.title: Return Portal
pages.text: Used in making the Stratospherical Portal
